= Uploading the code =

Connect your Flyduino to your PC with your FTDI adapter.

http://megapirate.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/FTDIconnection.PNG



Open arduino, and then:
 # File -> Sketchbook -> Sketches -> !MegaPirate
 # Tools -> Board -> Arduino Mega1280 for Flyduino V1.1 or Arduino Mega2560 for Flyduino V2.1
 # Tools -> Serial port -> choose the correct COM port
 # Click on the upload button
